page.title: 03FARMING-2
page.content:
The labour force over the last 50 years has dramaticaly reduced because of the advent of mechanisation.Also contractors are being used completely on one farm and to a lesser extent on others.
With over production now a serious matter in Europe farm incomes,in real terms,have declined since 1973, and it is felt by farmers that the trend to larger farms will continue.
Of the total acreage 72% is cropped with 12 out of 17 farms growing wheat.
Ridge and Furrow in the area accounts for 11% of the total acreage.
All but 4 farms have grassland.
